Name: BTU International, Inc
Description: DELISTED - BTU International, Inc. (BTU) is a global supplier of thermal processing equipment to the alternative energy and electronics manufacturing markets. BTU equipment is used in the production of solar cells and nuclear fuel, as well as in printed circuit board assembly and semiconductor packaging. In the solar market, BTU offers processing equipment for both silicon and thin film photovoltaics. Also in alternative energy, the Company's customers use its thermal systems for the processing of nuclear fuels. The Company's convection solder reflow systems are used to attach electronic components to the printed circuit boards. In the semiconductor market, the Company participates in both wafer level and dies level packaging, where its thermal processing systems are used to connect and seal integrated circuits into a package. The Company also provides equipment that is used for coating operations produced by BTU or purchased from a third party.
